author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: افرحي بما جعلكِ الله أفق النّور بما ولد فيكِ مطلع الظّهور وسمّيت بهذا الاسم الّذي به لاح نيّر الفضل وأشرقت السّموات والأرضون
translation: Erelong will the state of affairs within thee be changed, and the reins of power fall into the hands of the people. Verily, thy Lord is the All-Knowing. His authority embraceth all things. Rest thou assured in the gracious favor of thy Lord. The eye of His loving-kindness shall everlastingly be directed towards thee. The day is approaching when thy agitation will have been transmuted into peace and quiet calm. Thus hath it been decreed in the wondrous Book.
